about_the_game:
This is your story of survival, trust, and renown in the wild and unforgiving world of 1899 America. Embrace the challenge, make your choices, and see where your twisted path leads.



Survival in the wild is a true test of skill and strategy. Every encounter might leave you bleeding or with fractures, and each wound needs a special touch. Even walking barefoot can get a splinter in your foot. Keep hunger and thirst in check with a range of food and drinks. Ease the pain with painkillers. Can’t deal with intoxication - empty your stomach. With a variety of perks available, choosing the right ones can save lives.



Hunting is a core mechanic of any survival, providing essential materials for every aspect of play. It requires everything - from special guns and ammo to a strategic approach - but rewards those who master it with valuable resources, no matter their path in the wilds.



Surviving alone is always a challenge, but teaming up with a stranger is a gamble. If you want to survive, pay close attention to people and details. Sometimes, wiping your face, adjusting your sidebag, or even a quick prayer can make a raid easier.



A perfect shot or a misfire? It all depends on your planning and resources. Keep your supplies stocked and check your inventory for top-quality gear - repair worn equipment with spare parts you find. The rich inventory options ensure you're always prepared for any raid.



Build a Homestead - your renown starting point. Hire skilled workers to produce fine goods. Prospect your lands, build logistics and unite businesses. Maintain farming, mining and production - whatever suits your landscape the best. Cooperate and compete - do everything to overcome your rivals and impact the global economy. Make the whole world reckon with your name.
